google_translated: So it will not come to Okarin Lab

en_text: You're wrong!
jp_text: 違う！
google_translated: different!

en_text: You heard, right? Us talking at the lab...

google_translated: I heard that I talked with the last Lab

en_text: I don't want anything to destroy this time we have!

en_text: Then why?!
jp_text: だったら…

en_text: Ever since that one day, it's like you've been suffering so much...
jp_text: あの日から ずっとずっと オカリン 苦しそうだよ
google_translated: It seems that it seems to be anxious from that day

en_text: You know Orihime? It's the star called Vega.
